from vpython import *
import time

ball = sphere(pos=vector(0,0,0), radius=0.5, color=color.red)
arrow = arrow(pos=ball.pos, axis=vector(1,1,0), color=color.green)

dt = 0.01

    rate(100)

    arrow.axis = ball.pos
